text: aur (ai rasool) vah vakt yaad karo jab tumase hamane kah diya tha ki tumhaare paravaradigaar ne logon ko (har taraph se) rok rakha hai ki (tumhaara kuchh bigaad nahin sakate aur hamane jo khvaab tumaako dikhalaaya tha to bas use logon (ke eemaan) kee aazamaish ka zariya thaharaaya tha aur (isee tarah) vah darakht jis par quraan mein laanat kee gaee hai aur ham baavajood ki un logon ko (tarah tarah) se daraate hain magar hamaara daraana unakee sakht sarakashee ko badhaata hee gaya
